item.title: 特朗普加征关税，日本对美出口下滑
item.description: 日本 8 月份出口连续第四个月下降，原因是即使在 7 月份达成贸易协议之后，美国提高关税继续打击商业，尤其是汽车制造商。【原文：Japan’s exports fell in August for the fourth consecutive month as higher US tariffs continued to hit commerce, especially from carmakers, even after a July trade deal.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长认为降息暂告一段落，原因在于价格风险
item.description: 一位资深央行官员说，捷克决策者不应通过更多的降息来刺激经济，因为持续的通胀风险要求采取谨慎的措施。【原文：Czech policymakers shouldn’t stimulate the economy with more interest rate cuts as persistent inflation risks require cautious steps, a senior central banker said.】

item.title: 中国财政支出放缓对经济构成持续风险
item.description: 中国政府支出增速连续第二个月放缓，凸显出财政支持力度减弱对势头全面降温的经济构成的风险。【原文：China’s government spending increased at a slower rate for the second straight month, underscoring how weaker fiscal support now presents a risk to an economy whose momentum is cooling across the board.】

item.title: 随着 HPS 影响力的增长，Rick Rieder 对贝莱德债券团队进行了全面改革
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正在围绕新的投资策略和人工智能对其庞大的固定收益部门进行改革，该部门的杠杆融资业务将由该公司新收购的 HPS Investment Partners 的管理团队负责。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is revamping its massive fixed-income division around new investment strategies and artificial intelligence, as the unit’s leveraged finance business moves under an executive team from the firm’s newly acquired HPS Investment Partners.】

item.title: 瑞典政府建议削减福利以降低失业率

item.title: 奥地利将房屋租金管制扩展至私人合同
item.description: 奥地利正在将房屋租赁费上涨限制扩大到自由市场，这是奥地利为提高经济承受能力和缓解价格压力而采取的最新措施。【原文：Austria is extending a limit on home-rental-fee increases to the free market in its latest measure aimed at improving affordability and tempering price pressures.】

item.title: 挪威有望因降息而陷入困境：决策指南
item.description: 挪威政策制定者曾表示即将降息，但现在又提出了不执行降息的理由，这让投资者面临千钧一发的局面。【原文：Norwegian policymakers who signaled an upcoming interest-rate cut are now confronting arguments not to follow through with it, setting up investors for a close call.】

item.title: 欧佩克+放松管制，巨型油轮日收入接近 10 万美元

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯：欧洲央行已实现软着陆，但必须保持灵活性

item.title: 价格战加剧通货紧缩，中国如何应对 "内战
item.description: 在长期的价格战中，中国电动汽车行业的竞争日趋激烈。近年来，销售电池动力车和插电式混合动力车的品牌数量已从500家减少到129家。根据咨询公司 AlixPartners 的数据，预计到本十年末，其中只有十多个品牌在财务上是可行的。【原文：China’s electric-vehicle sector has become increasingly competitive amid a long-running price war. The number of brands selling battery-powered and plug-in hybrid vehicles has been whittled down from 500 to 129 in recent years. And just over a dozen of those are expected to be financially viable by the end of the decade, according to consultancy AlixPartners.】

item.title: 盖茨支持的基金与航空公司共同推动绿色航空燃料的发展

item.title: 押注美联储日平静的股票期权专业人士面临对冲不足的风险
item.description: 华尔街交易员几乎可以肯定，美联储将在今天晚些时候将利率下调四分之一个百分点。他们还相当肯定美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将发出进一步降息的信号，以支持疲软的劳动力市场。【原文：Wall Street traders are all but certain the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point later today. They’re also fairly sure Chair Jerome Powell will signal further reductions aimed at supporting a saggy labor market.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易特使与南非部长据称计划会晤
item.description: 知情人士称，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）和南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）预计将于周四举行会谈，以化解关税僵局。【原文：US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer and South African Trade Minister Parks Tau are expected to meet on Thursday in a bid to resolve an impasse over tariffs, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 关于美国与中国的 TikTok 协议，我们知道和不知道的事情
item.description: 经过一年多的谈判，中美两国达成了一项框架协议，将社交媒体平台 TikTok 在美国的业务剥离给一个包括软件巨头甲骨文公司在内的财团。如果协议最终敲定，它将解决北京与华盛顿关系中的一个老大难问题，这个问题已与更广泛的贸易谈判纠缠在一起。【原文：After more than a year of negotiations, the US and China have struck a framework agreement to hive off the US operations of social media platform TikTok to a consortium that includes software giant Oracle Corp. If the deal is finalized, it would resolve a persistent issue in Beijing-Washington relations that has become entangled in broader negotiations over trade.】
